title: S+ rank is possible...some how

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
http://imgur.com/PSlB3Hu
i though it was impossible to get S+ i just showed myself wrong ._.
Just wanted to ask has anyone else ever got one? not exactly sure how that happened
(put match history so you guys could see the stats)

replies.body:
I get s + all the time you just need to get a score of 9 1 0 with over 200 + cs or beter kda I got 3 s+ and 1 s- today I only played 7 games
and the rest I got b+ or beter

If you play a support champ, go bot, never ward, ks your ADC and get 5/0/0 with 200 CS, you get an S+

Can confirm because I play Xerath mid and supp, the Supp standards are MUCH lower.

If you play under-used champions, it's quite easy to pull off an S+

I've played support Vel'koz and pulled off an S+ with a KDA around 15/11/x.

Yet you can play Vayne, go 8/0/1 and only receive an A+.

I got an S+ when I played Thresh support for the first time...
Went 9/2/25... oops...
Wait people still look at the grade?
I got it the first game this system was implemented. as long as you play well you should get it pretty often.
